Skip to contents
penalizedLMM 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Function reference

    Generating data

    genDataPS()
    Generate data with population structure
    genGammaUnscaled()
    Generate a vector of environmental confounding effects
    genRelatednessMat()
    Generate a relatedness matrix
    genXps()
    Generate and X matrix with population structure

    Fitting penalized linear mixed models (PLMMs)

    plmm()
    Fit a linear mixed model with non-convex regularization
    plmm_lasso()
    Fit a penalizedLMM with lasso regularization using penalizedLMM
    plmm_mcp()
    Fit a penalizedLMM with MCP regularization using penalizedLMM
    plmm_nll()
    Evaluate the negative log-likelihood of a null Gaussian penalizedLMM model
    plmm_nll_nonnull()
    Evaluate the negative log-likelihood of a non-null Gaussian plmm model
    plmm_null()
    Estimate eta using a null Gaussian penalizedLMM model
    plmm_scad()
    Fit a penalizedLMM with SCAD regularization using penalizedLMM

    Loss, information, and cross-validation for PLMMs

    cvf()
    Cross-validation internal function for cv.plmm
    cv.plmm()
    Cross-validation for plmm
    gic()
    General information criterion method of selecting lambda for "plmm" class
    loss.plmm()
    Loss method for "plmm" class

    Coefficient methods for PLMMs

    coef(<cv.plmm>)
    Coef method for "cv.plmm" class
    coef(<plmm>)
    Coef method for "plmm" class

    Other model fitting methods (and some helper functions)

    convexMin()
    Calculate index for which objective function ceases to be locally convex
    lasso()
    Fit a linear model with lasso regularization
    lasso_pca10()
    Fit a linear model with lasso regularization and PC adjutment
    lmm_ggmix()
    Fit a linear mixed model with lasso regularization
    lmm_lasso()
    Fit a penalizedLMM with lasso regularization
    setup_lambda()
    Compute sequence of lambda values

    Data (pre)processing and wrangling

    preprocess()
    Preprocess PLINK files
    rotate_data()
    Compute transformed X and y for subsequent plmm rescaling and fitting
    scale_varp()
    Calculate scale by the population standard deviation, without centering
    unscale()
    Unscale coefficient values
    unstandardize()
    Unstandardize coefficient values
    varp()
    Calculate the population variance

    Plotting and formatting

    lamNames()
    Generate nicely formatted lambda vec
    plot(<cv.plmm>)
    Plot method for cv.plmm class
    plot(<plmm>)
    Plot method for plmm class

    Prediction

    predict(<plmm>)
    Predict method for plmm class

    Data sets

    admix
    Semi-simulated SNP data

    On this page
